title: Talks break in Geneva with no end to Russia’s war or hard-line demands
summary_full: After two hours of talks in Geneva on Wednesday, the head of the Russian delegation, Vladimir Medinsky, said negotiations had been “difficult but businesslike.”
summary_public: After two hours of talks in Geneva on Wednesday, the head of the Russian delegation, Vladimir Medinsky, said negotiations had been “difficult but businesslike.”

CH.label: neutral
CH.evidence: Talks break in Geneva with no end to Russia’s war
